title: SEVERE Bug that can effect anybody by the looks [NOT THE FIREWALL BUG] [URGENT, BAN IMMENENT]
body:
For the last two games I have been unable to join games due to a new glitch/bug/whatever and I do not know why
It occurs as follows
1. Log in
2. Find a game
3. Champion select as normal
4. As soon as the normal client is meant to close and reopen the 'loading screen' client nothing happens

The weird thing is the lobby client closes as normal however does not open the ingame client?
An even weirder occurrence is that clicking the menu next to time (where you can safely remove USB etc) there is a little riot logo. Upon clicking this logo it opens up the client again displaying the "RECONNECT" button.
When I click this reconnect button it closes the client as normal however does not open the 'loading screen' client? But in the USB remove tab thing next to the clock I can find the little riot logo again and clicking it opens the reconnect screen as so on.

If anyone has any idea on how to fix this please assist me, I am currently getting leave buster warnings constantly as I cannot join games randomly (this started occurring in the 3rd match of the day (3 normal matches, next match this occured, no breaks). I know this problem is blanketed by riot as one big firewall problem so I am aware that my support ticket will fall upon deaf ears

Things I have tried:
1. Repairing the client [x]
2. Retrying in a new game [x]
3. Reinstalling client [ ] (very time consuming)
4. Sending support ticket [x]

TLDL; if you are reading this I'm afraid you are no help ;p

Kind regards, Lasoo

replies.body: Assuming your AV is completely up to date, is anyone still having this issue? The [latest scan](https://www.virustotal.com/en/file/402bf2b9d5f09b8dd4f20b312c533a764712f2912cc3807a10fd721638d37862/analysis/) of the file on VirusTotal shows it is no longer being detected as malicious as of > 11 hours ago.
I would definitely suggest trying to turn off your AV and firewall and see if that makes a difference
I dont know if this has anything to do with it aswell but I cannot see any Public Chat rooms or and games to spectate
I have uninstalled Avast to check if it would still persist as there was no file in my virus vault and it is still not working even without avast installed :(

I got the same problem all of a sudden this afternoon (was playing last night and earlier today without any problems).

I have Telstra cable and I've tried rebooting pc / router.

The only extra thing I can add is you can easily tell if it's fixed or not by trying to spectate a game (won't work), this saves you from losing LP / getting banned etc.

I also have Avast so I wonder if it has something to do with AntiVirus software...

SOLUTION:

go to Avast Virus Vault and right click on the League of Legends process that got caught and overwrite file and add to exclusions list.

I've just tested and I'm now able to spectate a game which I was never able to previously do.
Yeah it looks like avast was the issue for me - I restored the file and added it to the exception list in the virus chest and just won a game ;)

right click > add to exception list
same issue ???? Why doesnt it work for me???

For some reason it still looks like the file is sitting in the virus chest, but I restored a couple of times until it asked me to overwrite the existing file. Once that was done, I restarted lol and it worked.
restored it many times, including saving it before it deleted and manual resotre.. nothing. Uninstalled Avast.. nothing
What file was it that you restored? I uninstalled Avast to try fix the problem, and believe the file may have been deleted.
possibly, updating AVAST did not solve the issue

I think it may be avast related - see attached screenshot

Avast seems to think there is a problem : http://malwarefixes.com/threats/win32evo-gen-susp/
